name: emotional support chicken
notes:
the emotional support chicken was made for a colleague to sit on her desk, hence why we called it her emotional support chicken. 

the [chicken crochet patter][1]n is super easy and is free on the website (supported by ads) or you can buy a pdf ad free digital copy to download and keep 


  [1]: https://www.crochet-patterns-free.com/2023/11/crochet-chicken-pattern-free.html
